mapper.insert: insert into TM(tseq, title, content, id, ttype) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(tseq), 0) + 1 FROM TM a),#{title },#{content },#{id }, #{ttype })
insert into TM_HAVE_INFO(thiseq,tnum,inum) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(thiseq), 0) + 1 FROM TM_HAVE_INFO a),(SELECT ifnull(max(tseq), 0) + 0 FROM TM b), #{inum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TM_HAVE_INFO WHERE TNUM=#{tseq} ORDER BY THISEQ ASC
SELECT * FROM TM WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY tseq DESC
SELECT * FROM TM WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY TSEQ DESC LIMIT 1
